title: Skills Knowledge Base
description: Create reusable skill files that encode best practices for each technology in the stack. Skills are referenced by agents to ensure consistent, high-quality code generation. This implements the 'Skill Composition & Reuse' idea.

context_chain.receives_summary: Agent definitions that reference skills by name — each skill must match what agents expect
context_chain.output_summary: Complete skill definitions that starter monorepo must conform to

idea_implemented: Idea 3 — Skill Composition & Reuse Across Projects

deliverables.description: Next.js App Router patterns: file-based routing, server/client components, layouts, loading/error states, metadata, image optimization. Used by Phases 1, 3, 7.
NestJS Clean Architecture: module structure, dependency injection, guards, interceptors, pipes, exception filters. Used by Phases 4, 5, 6.
Drizzle ORM patterns: schema definition, repository pattern, migrations, query builder, relations, transactions. Used by Phase 4.
Vitest testing patterns: component testing with Testing Library, mocking strategies, snapshot tests, coverage config, test organization. Used by all phases.
Testcontainers setup: PostgreSQL container, lifecycle management, connection handling, test isolation, parallel test support. Used by Phase 4.
Backend-for-Frontend patterns: response contracts, shared types, error format, pagination, API versioning. Used by Phases 2, 6, 7.
TanStack Query patterns: query keys, mutations, optimistic updates, cache invalidation, prefetching, error handling. Used by Phases 2, 3.
Zustand patterns: store creation, slices, selectors, middleware (devtools, persist), testing stores. Used by Phase 3.
MSW patterns: handler setup, request matching, response generation, browser/node integration, dynamic mocking. Used by Phases 2, 3.

tasks.title: Create frontend skills (Next.js, TanStack Query, Zustand, MSW)
tasks.description: Write the 4 frontend skill files. Each should include: overview, file structure conventions, code patterns with examples, common pitfalls, testing approach.

tasks.title: Create backend skills (NestJS, Drizzle, Testcontainers)
tasks.description: Write the 3 backend skill files. Each should include: architecture patterns, code examples, testing approach, and how they connect to each other.

tasks.title: Create shared skills (Vitest, BFF patterns)
tasks.description: Write the cross-cutting skill files that both frontend and backend agents reference.

tasks.title: Cross-reference skills with agents
tasks.description: Update agent files from Phase 1 to explicitly reference the correct skill files. Ensure each agent's 'skills' list matches actual file names.

acceptance_criteria: All 9 skill files exist with structured patterns and examples
Each skill includes: overview, conventions, code examples, pitfalls, testing notes
Agent files correctly reference skills by filename
Skills are self-contained — readable without needing other files for context
Code examples in skills match the starter monorepo structure (Phase 3)
